website_summaries.verdict: An easy-glide, quick-dry precision liner that's been an industry favorite for years.
pros: Thin tip is easy to use
Doesn't skip or pull, making it easy to draw straight lines
Color is rich and stays on without feathering, running, or smudging
Reviewers said it was still easy to wash off at night
Available in a variety of colors
cons: Some reviewers said it was not as waterproof as other brands they tried

customer_reviews.title: Crazy easy to appy!
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner so easy to apply that the blind can use it! I'm legally blind and do my make-up by feel. Eyeliner is the hardest to do so I've gone without for years. Decided to give this one a shot based on the reviews and was not disapointed. Came out great and was so easy to apply! So happy to be wearing eyeliner again! And yes I know some don't realize that the blind wear make-up or have trouble believing it would look good so heres a pic of my first try with this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Lowe Family

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 2 wks (same brand but from Sephora lasted 3-6 months)
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because normally when I buy this product from Sephora (and I've been using this product for years!), it lasts a few 3-6 months. But this time I bought it from Amazon and the eyeliner I received from the seller lasted 2 weeks (with normal use!). And I had bought 2 eyeliners with my purchase so it wasn't just an unlucky purchase where I somehow got a faulty one. Both eyeliners ran dry after 2 weeks each. Something's fishy from this seller. Definitely fishy if an eyeliner that normally can last 3-6 months now runs out after two weeks of daily use for very conservative and "barely there" eyeliner?!? I'm sticking to Sephora next time.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: ×××× WARNING ×××
customer_reviews.text: Beware guys. I don't know if it's the product itself or a sensitivity I'm not aware of. However I believe according to the reviews,.. im not the only one who has had this reaction. I tested a small bit of it (like half an inch) on my left hand and within an hour only my left hand started burning and tingling. I washed it all off immediately and the feeling went away. I can't imagine what could have happened if I had put it on my eye. Please be aware. Test your products before placing them on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is great, it lasts all day and it's too easy to use! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Biosum

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual Stila eyeliner and have repurchased it multiple times. I bought this one as a backup. Today was the first day I used it and I noticed differences like the packaging and the pigmentation of the eyeliner was as strong and black as it should be. But that didn't really bother me as much. After using it through the day it was really uncomfortable and when I looked in the mirror my eyes were red and a little swollen. This never happened with the eyeliners I bought from Sephora or ulta. I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Dries up FAST
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful, so I gave it two stars, BUT, it’s good for a very short period. It dried up so fast that you don’t get your money’s worth!! I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner on the market - worth a more expensive price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Stila eye liner. For me this is the best. The brush is nicely shaped and has just the amount of liner needed (be sure to shake pen before use). The length of the pen gives good control. Dark brown is a great color - defining but not too dark. I like that I can smudge the line with a little dark brown eye shadow. The price is a higher than I usually spend for a cosmetic I use every day, but after trying several eye liners - some more expensive and some cheaper - I find that this works well for me and also lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Hate that Stila stopped selling this color in stores!
customer_reviews.text: Of course since I love this color eyeliner, they stopped selling it. I stopped seeing it in stores/on Stila's website in the summer of 2018, so for those who are concerned how old this product is- keep that in mind when purchasing. This color is a true emerald/olive green. It is difficult to find this color in pen/liquid form. The tip is also great. In some cases, the tips of other brands dry out on the very tip and I have to cut them, which makes the tip fatter since I cut off the skinnier part. Highly recommend this color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best water proof eyeliner EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I have yet to try. I went to a water park and I spent the whole day there. I got to the hotel and looked at my eyeliner and it was intact. It didn't even fade a lil bit. Haven't used any other eyeliner since then. It also has the perfect siZe brush. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was using black stila for years and loved the ease of using it. But this product is no way close to its older versions. I would have given 0 stars if possible. There is absolute no color that comes out of the pen from day one. I always had to dip it in water to give some light shade and top it up with other darker brown cheap eyeliner. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: It is not intense.
customer_reviews.text: stila has a really good name in eyeliner, but I didn't find this eyeliner to hold up as well as its reputation. I get better coverage and staying power with drug store brands. The color isn't intense. The color is thin and a second or third coat doesn't intensify it.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite liners. Always check Amazon before I purchase because sometimes it's a few $$ off than normal price. UPDATED: The longer I have been using this the more I'm realizing it is not the real thing, and far from it! At first I noticed slightly. Bled a little, not as dark. Now, I have to go over the line 4 times for it to get as dark as one swipe of the real product. The tip is also starting to dry. With the actual Stila product it would last months. I have only had this for 2 months and used it at most 10 times. Learned my lesson!
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, never buy any other eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: After using stila I will never use another eyeliner. It is PERFECT! Application is always flawless, DARK BLACK (one layer is always enough) and it lasts me about a month with daily use. It’s thin enough that I can make a precise wing with no trouble. It literally stays on all day, no smudging or fading. I even use it on my little girls face sometimes like for Halloween (drawing pretty designs and whatnot) and it will stay on all day even though a whole day of daycare including naps, the teachers are always like “omg what did you use for her face?? It never even smudged”
customer_reviews.author: Klhw21

customer_reviews.title: Very fine tip makes it easy to apply, but it's NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I've been able to apply in a subtle line on my top eyelid. I like it that it comes in dark brown as well. I haven't had it long enough to tell how water resistant, or the length of time it goes on. It does dry very quickly. I'll be able to tell more after a little more time. Update: It's long lasting and still has clean lines, even when I slept in it overnight. Hardly any of it flaked off at the ends. It didn't smudge at all, even with oily skin. However, if it rains or water gets on your face, this immediately melts and runs off. It's not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: now I'm stuck with 2 useless eyeliners.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's an original product. It's dryer than my original black one I purchased elsewhere.. After application it gives me a sensation that I have a concrete slab on my eyelid. Don't know if it's some sort of allergic reaction... On the top of it - it print's on the top of an eyelid no matter what kind of base you use (I don't have this issue with my original one). I wish I bought only one to try... now I'm stuck with 2 useless eyeliners... (purchased green and brown from Amazon). I would not recommend this messy product
customer_reviews.author: Natalya P.

customer_reviews.title: Wears off in an hour or two
customer_reviews.text: I expected that this eyeliner would at least last for a few hours, but it wears off in an hour or so and is definitely NOT waterproof. For that price, I expected a quality product. I'll go back to the eyeliner crayons sold in drug stores. Definitely would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay IMO
customer_reviews.text: Wearability is great, but my gripe is with the application. These kinds of felt-tip eyeliner pens don’t work well with metallic shadow, which I use very frequently, if not daily. I’m fairly sure any shadow would stick to the tip, which affects later applications. Also, the eyeliner is kind of thin, and doesn’t go on as boldly as liquid eyeliner in a “inkwell” format, or a cream/gel eyeliner in a pot applied with a brush. If you’re going to wear black eyeliner, why wouldn’t you want full coverage? It kind of defeats the purpose, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: did not last for me...
customer_reviews.text: Okay- little background. I teach high school chemistry- which means I work all day with bunson burners and water boiling around me. I also barely have time to pee- let along reapply make up. I also have oily skin and eyelids, so I am a never-ending quest for make that lasts on my skin in this environment. This eyeliner is not it. It did not even make until lunch. Maybe it would work without the oily skin or without the heat and water vapor, but it did not stay on AT ALL for me. I tried using a setting spray and a primer, and it still did not work. so off to try another brand...
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Personally Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a liquid since I've only used 1 once. Nice color. After 5 hours I felt like I had paint drying on my eyelids...kinda like a stretching, cracking feeling. It was all gone except a thin line along my eyelashes that was doing that paint feeling & a lil itchy. Sorry...not a product I enjoy....but it may be different for you. It is a super thin line tip that I find difficult to make a good size noticeable line
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Pruitt Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Fake or faulty do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Either this product is a fake or the one one I received was faulty. It worked fine on the first use. By the second use the ink was watery and did not mark properly. I even shaker the pen thinking the ink perhaps sat and separated but it was not the case. I bought cheaper eyeliner that lasted longer. Do not spend $20 on this item unless you buy it from a trusted seller.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated customer from hell

customer_reviews.title: Nice lining. But It's not cry-proof or eyecurler proof
customer_reviews.text: I love how the eyeliner tip just glides flawlessly. But one thing I don't like about it is that it sticks to my eyelash curler. Little dried pieces of the eyeliner will stick to the back of the curler. You will have to use a translucent powder over the liner to prevent sticking. I tried using setting spray and letting it dry fully, but that doesnt work either. I wanted to add that it's not cry-proof. I was having major cat allergies the other day and my eyes were tearing and getting puffy. I didn't touch my eyes at all but my wet lashes we're making my eyeliner work watery. It's not very waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: LCL

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.text: I believe that the product I received was counterfeit. The actual still box in the store is silver with silver writing on the actual Marker. Mine is gold... With that said. The marker is great so far. Pigmentation is good even on just an eyelid. I would purchase this item again but in store. I do not want to take another 20 dollar gamble.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Always a valued product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during a Black Friday/cyber Monday deal at almost half the price. If you know anything about this product then you know it’s probably the best of the best. If not top 3 liquid eyeliners you can purchase. It can be pricey at times, but it happens a nice felt sharp tip that makes application easier (I’m a make up application amateur) and stays all day if you’re not into touching up your make up.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: only lasts 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I really like the eyeliner but it only last one month. I received the product June 3rd and by July 5th I could not get any more to come out. I have had my Maybelline liquid eyeliner for 6 months and it was just starting to go on light and read about Stila being so highly rated for water and smudge proof. The Maybelline was good but thought I would give Stila a try. I was very happy with it. I went on vacation, in a pool most of the time and it did not smudge at all. But $22 for one month of use is way to much. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stress enough how amazing this liner is
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is AMAZING. If you’re thinking about getting ANY other liquid eyeliner especially a waterproof one, just get this one. It’s great because my liquid eyeliner always used to transfer to my upper eyelids because of my hooded eyes, this liquid eyeliner is amazing because it doesn’t do that and it stays looking fresh all day. When it’s time to take it off it’s surprisingly VERY easy to take off with a simple makeup remover wipe/face wipe. The face wipes I use are Kirkland brand and they’re not even meant for waterproof makeup and it comes right off with those. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bpretty01

customer_reviews.title: color is very good as below i bought from Macys
customer_reviews.text: before i always bought this from store, but because pandemic time, I bought this online, the packing box is good, inside packing is good, but when i open the hard lid for the tube, inside have liquid run out. i just cleaned it and try the color, color is good as before, but just leak make me not happy, i don't know how much have been run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette G

customer_reviews.title: Warning: At 73 cents a day, probably the most expensive eyeliner you can buy. But it is great.
customer_reviews.text: Funnily enough, of all the make-up products you use in your life-time, this may turn out to be the most expensive. Just for yucks I decided to crunch the numbers. At $22 per applicator that lasts for roughly a month with daily application once a day, it comes out to 73 cents a day. Yeah, I have some crazy expensive Korean stuff and other impulse buys that seem downright cheap compared to this daily cost per day. But this eyeliner works great. And I feel embarrassed that I spend this much on eyeliner. I'll use this until I find something less extravagant to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Owen's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing until it leaves black specks everywhere :(
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings on this eyeliner. It starts out incredible - it goes on smooth, it's easy to apply, it lasts a long time, it doesn't smudge and it looks nice and dark. The problem is after a few hours (or even as soon as it dries if you touch it) it starts flaking and it leaves little black specks everywhere. They sooo hard to get out of my eyelashes even with eye makeup remover. If it didn't do that it would be perfect. 😕 If they found a way to fix that one issue I would be thrilled and only use this kind of eyeliner the rest of my life. Until then it's not something I'll use.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiCatLadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last half the day
customer_reviews.text: Put it on around 10 am and by 3pm it was all crumbly and halfway off (see photo). I was inside and doing basically nothing, so no sweat or anything crazy. I wasn’t wearing anything on my face besides this eyeliner and mascara, so it had nothing to do with mixing with other product. I paid 10x more for this than the drugstore stuff and it didn’t even last as long as a drugstore eyeliner. Gave it 2 stars because I really like the applicator tip, but who cares what the applicator feels like if the product doesn’t work? :( Wish I could return it and definitely would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Stila is hands down still the best waterproof black eyeliner on the market
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other cheaper alternatives including Dolly Wink and Kill Black, Stila is hands down still the best waterproof black eyeliner on the market. I can take a profusely sweat on a hot and humid day and it will not smudge. Obviously if you've wet it and then touched your eye it will smudge but other than that, it really does stay on. I draw on a cat eye line daily once a day and 1 pen will last me about 3 months. When it starts to feel a bit try I just wet it under the running water and recap it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyeliner for years because I like the applicator and how the product applies. To save effort, I thought I would try subscribing to receive this in the mail from Amazon instead of re-ordering from Ulta each time. The product I received in the mail does not match my other Stila liners. The tip is stiff and the product doesn't glide on like my others do. I noticed the serial number on the edge is printed differently as well. Cancelling my subscription and ordering from Ulta instead future going. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stay all day
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy because other reviews talked about the silver packaging and getting an eye infection from a fake product. I took a risk and bought it. I was super excited to see that I had received the gold packaging but it definitely isn’t “stay all day”. I bought one of the blue shades and love the color. But by the end of the day you can see it’s faded. Very disappointed to have spent the money. I wanted something stay proof and waterproof (not very waterproof either) for a vacation we were going on. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dry, does not go on smooth. Expired?
customer_reviews.text: Seems more dry in the tube than the last Stila that purchased. I am wondering if there has been a change in the formula or if this was approaching its expiration date. Not nearly as terrific as my last Stila purchase! I used to love this eyeliner, but the item I received on this particular purchase is of much poorer quality. The "pen" itself is pretty dry and doesn't go on smooth. I'm sad to say this because I have used this product for a couple of years, but I'll probably end up switching eyeliner brands. I might give it one chance and see if I have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Geesha Girl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice waterproof eyeliner so I checked reviews on a few different products taking into consideration that there are always bad reviews. It was a choice between this one and another and reviews -good and bad- were about the same on either product. I applied this eyeliner this morning at 6:30 AM and it's now 9:30 AM and most of it is gone. It's cold so there is no heat or sweating to cause it to melt off. Waste of money. I've had better luck with $7 store bought eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Judy K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Hooded eyes rejoice!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many eyeliners I've gone through that promised what Stila absolutely delivers. The thin, precise tip allows you to really get in tight along the lash line. Once dried, it DOES NOT transfer to upper lids -- even if you have oily skin, and/or live in a ridiculously humid climate! Bonus: it comes off easily with make-up removing wipes. If you have hooded eyes like me, this is the eyeliner you've been waiting for!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm an eyeliner fiend. I was afraid to order from amazon because i feel like you never know with make up but this is legit. its just like the ones I order from Ulta and Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan James XO

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner available!
customer_reviews.text: Another Amazon Amazing product! Stila is a great indie line of cosmetics. I discovered this eyeliner at a mall cosmetic shop, you know that one that starts with S. During this time of being confined at home, thankfully AMZ carries Stila. The eyeliner is great, applies smoothly and lasts all day. It is jet black, does not smudge off, and does not bleed. The tip makes it very easy and quick to apply. This is really the best eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best, no question!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best eyeliner I’ve used. It stays all day as it claims and is easy to use. The only thing I’d complain about is that the tip (applicator) tends to wear out (fray) within about 2-3 weeks of use. I have to trim it because it’s impossible to apply the product. Other than that I’d highly recommend! Ps. Make sure to buy this product and everything else from Amazon or from Stila. I don’t trust other sellers. They sell knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Chevychicky

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and lasts like crazy. But I'm docking a star because it's supposed to be dark grey. Maybe my idea of dark grey is different than everybody elses, but I doubt it. This applies pretty much black. Sure, it's not jet black, or super glossy-blackest black.. but it's black nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its just me with my hooded eyes but this did not work for me. Lasts maybe 3 hours. Then starts to fade. To be fair I've tried so many different kinds of eyeliners. Brands and textures and none of them last any longer than 3 hours. Also, I don't use concealer or setting spray so maybe that says something. Im mot a full faced make up kind of person. But I want my eyeliner to last me all day. Can't seem to get that anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amorette3

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long enough!
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed about this eyeliner! I saw so many great reviews and was really excited to try this, but it just didn't hold true for me. It goes on great, it's really easy to apply and you can get it super close to your lash line. The problem I have is how long it lasts, I saw fading after about an hour of wear, which is definitely not what I expected. I think I will stick to cheaper brands from now on because in this case they work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Weber

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Oh yes.
customer_reviews.text: My best liquid liner I've used. Tip is like a thin, elongated felt-tip marker & actual liquid comes out of the spongy tip, not by pressing down on tip like others I've used (and disliked). This gives a steady flow of liquid, not a blob here or there, depending on steadiness of hand applying liner. Also love the tip, which can give a thick or thin line, depending on angle of application. It's not a brush-type tip, I don't care for on my liquid liners. All day staying power, slightly wet look but dries quickly to semi-gloss. All in all one of the best liners on the market.
customer_reviews.author: taptrap12Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t waterproof until you try to remove it. The color is great but the tip dries way too fast making it difficult to apply. Unfortunately I couldn't do a touch up because as you are trying to re apply it, the tip starts to take off whatever little product you already had on and it makes it look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dried /old liner
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 stars because I literally used it no more than 7 times before it went dry. I’m not going in the office due to Covid and therefore use makeup less. Nonetheless, I used it occasionally but it quickly dried. Sephora eyeliner lasts months. Will not purchase makeup from here going forward. Save yourself time and money and purchase directly from a beauty store or website.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a nicer product than this. Super happy I bought it on prime day and not at full price. The tip isn’t soft enough making it difficult to control. It also doesn’t feel great against your eyelid. The product itself is streaky and takes multiple coats to look right. This strikes me more of an off brand drugstore product rather than something high end. Won’t be buying again. If you’re looking for a better liquid eyeliner, Tarte, Sephora, and Urban Decay all have better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand why people like this eye liner. Yes it is waterproof. Yes it lasts. It also is SO STICKY. The lined part of my eye sticks to my upper lid. I can feel the eye liner when I blink. I absolutely HATE this liner and will stick to my other trusted brands in the future. Waste of money for me
customer_reviews.author: Allie O

customer_reviews.title: The only eyeliner that has not melted off!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this based off some recommendations, and could not be more satisfied. I wear contact lenses so my eyes tend to be more watery and I have really oily skin, and have never found a waterproof or long-lasting eyeliner that was not sliding and melting off within an hour of applying. Stila Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner has stayed in place through the hottest, most humid weather, through tears, you name it. And I LOVE the felt-tip style applicator... it is SO easy to make perfect wings every time. Best eyeliner I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many "bargain" white eyeliners and decided to try this 22 dollar one thinking it may be superior. Nope. It seemed to already be dried out, difficult to get an even line because it skipped across the lid. I learned.
customer_reviews.author: layla4444

customer_reviews.title: BEST eyeliner for dunces!
customer_reviews.text: I am the WORST at applying eyeliner. Like, truly terrible. I gave up on eyeliner completely in 2012 after trying every single product on the market. It was just too hard to get it right. Emotionally draining. Eyeliner ruined several of my relationships. I'm serious. Then I saw this on a Buzzfeed list and IT. CHANGED. EVERYTHING. This is SO easy to apply. Like, I *KNOW* you can do it. Because I can do it. I will never try any other product--this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Edianter

customer_reviews.title: This stays put
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most precision, stay put eye line I’ve ever used. I work long hours, sweat a lot, sometimes get rained on, so happy to have an eyeliner that doesn’t make me look like a raccoon. I just wish I could have found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Strumboss

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: If you purposely wanna budge it it does budge in water. But tears or mild droplets doesn't affect the liner
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This liner is very easy to apply. I usually have trouble applying a wet eyeliner Cons: The product appeared to be a bit dry, so I needed to go over several times. It may be waterproof, but it is not sweat proof. I wore a base underneath, but the liner was in the crease within 2 hours Update: The brown liner has staying power. The previous notes were based on the charcoal color, which had no staying power. I'm adding 1 star because of that
customer_reviews.author: Mileseymom

customer_reviews.title: Dry, No Paint, No Mixing Ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and realized that it does not have a mixing ball inside it like my previous purchases of the black. The blue is a nice color but it is so dry and empty as if it is old. There is barely enough coming out. I would be surprised if it lasts me 2 weeks as there is barely any coming out as it is that dry. Where is the paint and where is the mixing ball? For the price that I paid for this.....it should have enough liquid in it to at least last me 4 months. I am sad about this!
customer_reviews.author: Creative Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not the same.......
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyeliner for a few years now and wanted to take advantage of this promo but I don't know what this is .... I don't want to say it's an imitation but it is not the same one I've always bought from Sephora and Ulta This one bleeds and smudges off with one swipe while dry and gave me raccoon eyes 😱 I was sold on this eyeliner years ago for my wedding in Cancun and I loved it since I'm disappointed and am returning this item I gave two stars because it arrived a day early
customer_reviews.author: rosemary zapata

customer_reviews.title: Flakey when dry and Not good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty much waterproof but it’s definitely not oil proof and if your skin produces oil throughout the day and you rub your eyes by the end of the day this eyeliner will rub off and it’s flakey. I am going to try with eyeshadow primer first, hopefully that keeps everything in place but now I have to buy a waterproof primer... For 21$ I’m really surprised and kind of upset that this doesn’t work as expected. I never splurge so much on makeup since I don’t wear much but I am going on my honeymoon for a month and will be in the water a lot and wanted to have my eyes done up a little.
customer_reviews.author: Bblight88

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eye liner of all time! Stays put and lasts ALL day
customer_reviews.text: IT's not 100% smudge proof, but it's more smudge proof than other liquid liners I've used. I love the fine tip of the brush for fine detail like cat eye, wings, etc. It's so much fun and easy to apply, but if it's still wet and I make a mistake, I can just use a q-tip to clean it off and reapply. I love this liner, and it's still smooth and not clumpy on the brush. I'll definitely repurchase when it runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dolly Garnecki

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have time to go to Ulta so I bought online. It came in the orginal packaging and it was the real stuff and not a fake. It went on smooth and was smudge proof all day. The applicator has the precise liner that I expected. I’ve been using Stila for the past 4 years. I bought it for the reviews and was impressed. I wore it in Florida in their hot sticky humidity and it worked like a champ. While the rest of my makeup sweated off my eyeliner was the only thing that stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: NOT AUTHENTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: There’s a couple of reviews on here that I Whole-heartedly agree with after being also a BIG stila waterproof eyeliner fan. This product on Amazon is definitely in-authentic. My pen started drying out after 1-2 weeks of use... the Stila pen I’ve purchased from Sephora has previously lasted me almost 8 months. I was SHOCKED. Also took a gamble and bought it a second time on Amazon only to experience the same thing. Don’t purchase this product from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product. The first 2 times I used it it did work great, making a nice fine line. By the third time using it I had to go over it a few times to get some decent color. I shook it and stored it point down thinking that would help. I've used it about 3 more times and at this point the only way to get any color out of it is to use the side of the felt tip. This is very disappointing. I will be trying to return this product which makes me sad. I really wanted it to work well. The green color was perfect. :(
customer_reviews.author: Earth Rhythms

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year now and I love it. It does not smudge, it does not run, it does not irritate my eyes. I use eye shadows and I apply my Stilla liner over them, so it's a good idea to re-apply it during the day once to make it brighter, but it's still visible and not smudged even if you do not. I wash it off with warm water and soap easily. The tip is firm and I never have a problem drawing a straight line. It lasts for 3 months and then I order the new one.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Worst Eyeliner I’ve Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst eyeliner I’ve ever used. It skips and then dries quickly so when you try to go over it the line you had put down comes up. It’s impossible to get a nice normal application. I’d be surprised if this isn’t a knockoff because a brand like Stila couldn’t afford to have such an awful product out there. I’m really annoyed at Buzzfeed too as this product came very highly recommended as one of their Prime Day must haves!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bennet

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF $$$
customer_reviews.text: From now on, I will only buy this product in person at a store. Every time, I buy on-line, I end up disappointed. Either it's counterfeit or old; maybe both. It dries up after only a few applications.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE PATTERSON

customer_reviews.title: Fake products
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is fake. I’ve been using stila waterproof eyeliner for a few years. This one is different from the ones purchased from stila official website. It’s easily smudged. I applied it in the morning, drove to work and 45 minutes later, the eyeliner has started to come off and smudge on my lower eyelids. Also, the eyeliner tip feels harder than the real ones. Not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: GtownOllie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS EYELINER
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a recommendation from a friend. It was my first time trying liquid eyeliner and I really wanted one that didn't smudge (especially because my eyelids make it very easy). It's totally smudge proof, dries quickly. The best part is that I wore it to a pool party and it WILL wash off but it doesn't smear off, it just sort of flakes off so there's no running eyeliner down your face. Been recommending it to all my friends and even bought my mom one.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale on Amazon Prime Day. To be honest, I wasn’t going to get it, but it was in my cart when my fiancé was trying to buy an Amazon fire stick, so here we are. I have an unsteady hand and even unsteadier eyelid, and even I could draw a smooth line where the liner should be. The best part: once this guy is on, he’s committed, so I don’t have to keep retracing over the same line that took me 15 minutes to make earlier that morning.
customer_reviews.author: Casey D

customer_reviews.title: Stays on. A true all day eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Extremely long wearing. The fine tip makes it easy to attain an extremely thin line or a thicker line. Subtlety can be obtained by faintly dotting on the product so that it looks like the lash points in the lids (particularly helpful in the lower lash line). Once it dries it is not leaving without a remover. I use Cetaphil cleanser and it works despite being waterbased.
customer_reviews.author: Ava F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I decided to look for a waterproof eyeliner because my allergies are so bad and I kept wiping off my eyeliner during the day while trying to keep my eyes dry. Plus, I was getting ready for a trip that would take me to a very humid climate and I still wanted to wear eyeliner while looking like a sweaty mess. Stila produces some great cosmetics and I decided to give this one a try. It works perfectly. It goes on smooth and wet, allowing you to manipulate and fix smudges as needed, then it dries and will not come off until you use makeup remover. It lasts through sweat, watery eyes, and rain.
customer_reviews.author: April in California

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite liquid liner! I use it pretty much everytime I do my makeup, and I'm always pleased with the outcome. The felt tip is flexible and easy for me to wing out or tightline. It's thin and easy to manipulate. I am so happy with it! The color is opaque, and very black. It doesn't dry shiny either. 100% recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this is genuine stila eyeliner - no rattle inside
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is a genuine product. All of my stila felt tip eyeliners have a rattle thing in them, but this one does not, and it's much harder to apply. The color doesn't seem to come out of the felt tip. I wish I had realized how it was different sooner, and I would have returned it. Disappointing, because I LOVE stila eyeliners.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pen eyeliners out there!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the lookout for long lasting pen/liquid eyeliners. I've tried A LOT of brands. Most don't last long and dry out in the container. I decided to take advantage of this deal of the day. I would have bought double and more colors, had I known I would love it so much! It glides on smoothly and effortlessly. It really does last all day, and sometimes it even looks fabulous the next morning! It does not flake off or look cake-y at all. You don't have to worry about raccoon eyes if you cry or have allergic, watery eyes. I hope they make this another deal of the day again soon, because I'll be stocking up!
customer_reviews.author: N. Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the high ratings. But my eyes water and this liner didn't perform any better than all other liners and pencils I've tried. After only a few minutes the liner is smudged. I also don't like products packaged so that I don't know when it's running out. Am very surprised at the number of glowing reviews I gave it two stars because it is easy to apply (though not so if you want a thicker line) and it's very neat to use. At the price, I wish I'd gotten my money back.
customer_reviews.author: eeternal16

customer_reviews.title: Dries out fast and smudges.
customer_reviews.text: Does smudge. Is super black and liquid and does have thin tip but hard to make a perfect wing because dries out so fast. Does run dry before being able to get to both eyes in one sitting. I only make a small half wing on my eyes and it ran dry and I just bought it. Does rub off to under eyes after several hours. Not waterproof or smudge proof.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: this color is beautiful BUT first time using it
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am no beginner to makeup, saw this on amazon and thought hey don't have to drive to ulta to buy it. Bought the stila periwinkle color, this color is beautiful BUT first time using it, it barely lines, husband said to hold upside down like a dry erase marker, did that, its like its empty, pretty pissed I threw away the box already (garbage day) so can't return. someone said its fake, I think it was someones and they used it and sold it 1/16th left. It was not shrink wrapped. so disappointed. I really wanted this color.
customer_reviews.author: CocoaMO

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a perfect eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many liquid eyeliners & finally found one that I hope is never discontinued! Easy to use, smooth, perfect color intense black & stays on all day! It is waterproof & smudgeproof!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this again,
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. It is difficult to apply, meaning that the color will not go on the lids easily. It takes many swipes and a lot of pressure in that delicate area to get the color where you want it. Once the eyeliner is in place, it will last for several hours, but did run. I had color under my eyes which needed to be wiped away. I would not buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne W

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews and a magazine article on makeup gave this a try. This has survived a very humid and hot three days no smearing or flaking bought the charcoal first time and was so pleased that I ordered the brown. Felt the price was not that bad compared to all the cheaper drugstore liners that did not hold up and wasted money on. w ill try some of the other colors-also the tip is fine and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof it is not.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this product to be waterproof as that's what it claims to be. It isn't. It smudges, it comes off easily. I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom in Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: I was SUCH a holdout.....now a BELIEVER!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff IS great. I've tried dozens of other "waterproof" liners but this is the best. Goes on smooth and dark - no patchiness or translucence. I wear eyelash extensions, so I don't wash my lashes very vigorously, so this will stay on over multiple days, with just a touchup in the morning, saving me sooo much time. I love the 24/7 definition. Thank you, Stila.....I'm sorry I ever doubted you.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeFiend

customer_reviews.title: It's Stila, what can I say
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and was quite satisfied with my first online purchase of it. It goes on evenly and stays on pretty well although I notice a bit of smudging in the corners after a few hours. It may be from product that got onto my eyelashes but I'm uncertain. Overall though it's the best liner I've used.
customer_reviews.author: LaVaun

customer_reviews.title: Slightly More Watery than Black Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This tea waterproof liquid eyeliner was a lot more watery than the other Stila eyeliners I've used. I have the micro-tip one in black which is fantastic, and the regular size one in black. This one seemed watered down when I tried to apply it to my eyelids. I had to work with it for a while and keep adding layers. Once I did, it stayed put for over 12 hours. The deep teal color is vibrant and beautiful. Overall this is a reliable waterproof liquid eyeliner. It just seems a little runnier than the other eyeliners in the black color.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great black liquid eye liner
customer_reviews.text: Great black liquid eye liner. It is my favorite brand and it looks great. I would say that you could cry while wearing this, or do a light workout, but I wouldn't recommend wearing this if you are going swimming. If you wait like 2 seconds after putting it on, it will NOT get on your upper lid. Lasts all day at work, but if I'm going on a date after work, then I re-apply.
customer_reviews.author: shesellsseashells

customer_reviews.title: love this liner
customer_reviews.text: I love using this eyeliner. I have tried so many eyeliners and this one is a little more money than other eye liners out there but very much worth it. its small and compact, not a lot of pieces to deal with. The felt tip is smooth and goes on smooth and long lasting. Love the color, its a true black. Very happy with this eyeliner. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Clara H

customer_reviews.title: Last all day and night - NO flaking!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and I absolutely love it. The brush is easy to use to place a thin or thick line. It stays on all day and night and it does NOT flake. I ordered a cheaper product and it flaked horribly. I am terrible about taking off my makeup and it's still there in the morning. I highly recommend it. Now, if they'll just run another sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeweltn

customer_reviews.title: Not the same stuff
customer_reviews.text: This last order was, I think, a fake. I have been using this liner for two years and usually get it at Ulta. This came and is very runny and bleeds all over. Some got in my eye and it burned, not normal! And I also got a stye under my lid for the first time in my life after using this. I can’t be sure it’s the cause but it seems likely. Will be going back to ulta where I know it’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle Bird Terrariums

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for an all day, smudge-proof eyeliner and I'm very disappointed! Paid way to much for something that doesn't even last half a day.
customer_reviews.author: ejkim

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply, but flakes off too soon
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a "magic marker" type of eyeliner for some time because I want a fine, natural looking line. This is easy to apply and looks great at first. However, by noon the line was starting to flake off and look funky. Too bad as I had high hopes. What remained by the time I got home did need eye makeup remover to get off. Maybe more suitable for a bolder line?
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Inauthentic product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this item before and unfortunately this is not a legit Stila eyeliner despite the packaging appearing so real. I wore it to work for my 12 hour shift. Within an hour it had already smudged on my eyelid crease. That doesn’t happen with this product I’ve used in the past. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: CBSNgal

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: My sister is a makeup guru in my opinion and recommended to me this product. I loved how easy this eyeliner was to apply a fine point it had. Even with a fine point, it was easy to build up for a dramatic look. I haven't worn in the water yet but it stays really well and I usually use a facial oil to take it off at the end of the day. Worth the extra money compared to a less expensive eyeliner. I will abolstiely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: G Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Literally lasts ALL day
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner! I used to use Kat Von D waterproof eyeliner but it didn't apply as easily as I thought so I searched for other options. This eyeliner was easy to apply and doesn't require a million strokes to get an even layer across the lash line. It's a glossy/shiny looking which I'm not a super fan of but sometimes I apply a little bit of black eyeshadow overtop to give it more of a matte look. This eyeliner honestly stays put all day and I'm not having to look in the mirror to fix smudging. Easily removed with makeup remover or a wet washcloth. Will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: No after application transfer smudge even with mask.
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner. I forgot how great Stila eyeliners are. I will be ordering more. They do not transfer color into the fine lines. Bravo. My NARS has been so “leaky” to my lower eye lid especially with a mask. This eyeliner has stayed put. Love the dark blue shade. No transfer to lower lid with mask. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dark Brown Eye Liner! Not everyone wants black.
customer_reviews.text: I originally discovered liquid eyeliner through an Eyeko sample I got in a Birchbox and was hooked. However, I could only find Eyeko liner in black, which is too harsh for me. Gave this a try and it has become my new everyday eyeliner. Stays put all day, I can put it on quickly without mistakes, doesn't smudge. I haven't tested how waterproof it is yet, so I can't speak for that aspect. I already ordered 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Brasuell

customer_reviews.title: This is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner might be fine for some people, but due to allergies I have extremely watery eyes. I have been searching forever for an eyeliner that will stay on my eyes and not wash away and this is not it. I put it on and within an hour it's gone. Oh well... Another one for the garbage can. If your eyes water save your money. Anyone know of anything that actually works?
customer_reviews.author: Postms

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Eye Liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. The liner is true to the color stated, and will stay on all day...all day. Many eyeliners I've used in the past have worn off by the end of the day. This one stays on until you take it off. And the tip makes it super easy to apply. It's the only kind I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is very easy to apply. It really is very forgiving and you don’t have to be an expert makeup artist to apply. Some liquid eyeliners are difficult to apply. It hasn’t irritated my eyes (others I’ve used have) which was what I was looking for. Also, love that it comes in brown. Hard to find anything but black in the good ones! Don’t ask me why.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great liner! The reviews were right!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say..: the reviews don’t lIe this is an awesome product and glad I found it. Not for those that want a Smokey eye but for straight lines that stay all day look no further —— no this review wasn’t sponsored by anyone I actually use and bought the product.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Ray

customer_reviews.title: Alloy is perfect for a light complexion!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeliner! I got Alloy, and am very impressed with the color. I was looking for a dark grey eyeliner because I have fair skin and light green eyes. Black is too harsh, and I'm not a huge fan of brown. At first I tried it on my hand and thought it looked too light, but when I applied it on my eyes with neutral eyeshadow, it was darker and really highlighted the green in my eyes. If you're looking for a neutral alternative for black eyeliner, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beware FAKE or OLD product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this eyeliner and bought it at Sephora. When I received this I realized the writing on it was gold not silver and different then I've ever seen! After using 3 days my eyes are irritated so it must be a knock off and not really Stila!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mol1231005

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, dark, and long-wearing
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner! Affordable, gentle around my eyes and skin, and lasts all day. One of these eyeliner pens lasts me 4-5 months with daily use (about 6 days a week). The brush tip also holds together for easy application the entire time. I can't ask for more than that. I'm a loyal customer for as long as this eyeliner is available.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite eye liner! After trying many brands, this has been, by far, the best value in a liquid eye-liner. She only has to apply it once and it gets her through her whole day. The price is very fair, and the eye-liner is very high quality. She has been very satisfied and is likely a customer for life! Thanks Stila!
customer_reviews.author: Vascodamus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive... but it was worth the price. Itd be more worth it for someone who does their eyeliner every day. It stays put and the applicator is great. And I LOVE that it comes in brown. I bought a NYX liner as well when I purchased it and that one was just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell P.

product_meta.title: stila Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark Brown (Rich Chocolate)| Style:OriginalFinally a waterproof liquid liner that glides on with ease won't smudge or run, and stays in place until you say when! The thin marker-like tip is easy to use even for the least experienced, and delivers a defined thin line to a dramatic bold line with precision. Goes on smoothly without skipping, smudging, or pulling, and lasts all day!

BRAND STORY
By Stila Cosmetics

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
